boost::logging::level::holder_no_ts

boost::logging::level::holder_no_ts Struct Reference

Filter - holds the level, in a non-thread-safe way. More...

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Filter - holds the level, in a non-thread-safe way.

Holds the level, and tells you if a specific level is enabled. It does this in a non-thread-safe way.

If you change set_enabled() while program is running, it can take a bit to propagate between threads. Most of the time, this should be acceptable.
